name: A Normal Day: Kiosk Simulator
description:
This game was developed as part of a rapid prototyping course and entry for the JAMUARY! 2018 Jam during the course of approximately a week.  

You play as an employee of a small conveniant store. It is your job to tend to the costumers, clean up the mess they make and in general keep a good attitude. Sounds simple? Then you have never worked in a store. 

Here is your chance.

Developed by: 

Can Mert Bozkurt - Programming

Rüdiger (Rue) Brandis - Game Design and Art (https://rue.itch.io/)

Alex Boccia - Art and SFX (https://itch.io/profile/microsoftsam)
